title: Phenotypic Feature
description: Schema for submitting a phenotypic feature.

feature.title: Phenotypic Feature
feature.description: The phenotypic feature observed for the donor.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: A quantity associated with the phenotypic feature, if applicable.
quantity.comment: Specification of this property requires quantity_units.

quantity_units.title: Quantity Units
quantity_units.description: The unit of measurement for a quantity associated with the phenotypic feature.
quantity_units.comment: Specification of this property requires quantity.

observation_date.title: Observation Date
observation_date.description: The date the feature was observed or measured.
observation_date.comment: Date should be submitted as YYYY-MM-DD.
